eject-system.name: Eject System
eject-system.result: Disable a non-disabled system, if you do, remove one condition from this mech.

balancer.name: Heat Balancer
balancer.result: _Friendly Neutrino Mech only._ Transfer any ammount of overheat cards between this mech and the target.

glare.name: Neutrino Glare
glare.result: All mechs within range gain **blinded**. This action range is equal to the **overheat value** of this mech.

heat-transfer.name: Heat Transfer
heat-transfer.desc: If a mech receives damage from an action on this system, discard up to **2 overheat cards**, then the target **draws the same ammount of cards** (discard and replace jokers) and adds them to its **overheat pile**.
